name: Overgrown (itch) (ph3rin)
description:
Overgrown Planets is a 2D game for 2-4 players. Players control different spaceships and compete against each other to take over planets. Each individual round of the game has a time duration dependent on the number of players. The first player to take over the most planets in the allotted time wins the round.

  • Art/ Production: Haotian Zhang 
  • Design/ Production: Nicholas Doherty 
  • Audio: Haley Adams
  • Programming: Billy Wang 
  • Animation: Yuheng Zhao
  • Support: 
    • Sarah Yuen
    • Sairam Bandi 
    •  Revanth Madamala
